content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm the one who's been helping you plan your trip to Paris, not the other way around! It was my pleasure to assist you and provide you with tips and recommendations.

But I must say, I'm glad we could have this conversation and help you feel more prepared and excited for your trip. If you do have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Otherwise, I wish you a wonderful trip to Paris and I'm sure you'll have an amazing time exploring the City of Light!

Au revoir, and happy travels!
